title: With Eye on Olympics and Tour de France, Demi Vollering’s Rampage Continues at Tour de Suisse
content:
‘It is always good to win climbing races before your big goal’: Dutchwoman on a Swiss roll, taking three out of four stages.

Read the full article at With Eye on Olympics and Tour de France, Demi Vollering’s Rampage Continues at Tour de Suisse on Velo.
author: sstokes
